SEARCH
Package org.example.controller

Class ChaosGameController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.ChaosGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChaosGameObserver
public class ChaosGameController extends Object implements ChaosGameObserver

ChaosGameController.

The controller class for the Chaos Game page of the application. It handles the logic for the Chaos Game page, and is responsible for running the Chaos Game.

The class implements the ChaosGameObserver interface, and listens for changes in the Chaos Game, such as updating the image if the canvas is updated, or auto running the Chaos Game if the description is changed.

Since:
0.3.0
Version:
1.0.0

      public ChaosGameController(MainController mainController, ChaosGame chaosGame, JuliaSetGame juliaSetGame)
      Constructor for the ChaosGameController class.
      Parameters:
      mainController - the main controller for the application. Used for switching between views.
      chaosGame - the Chaos Game model for the application.
      juliaSetGame - the Julia Set Game model for the application.

  • Method Details

    • setJuliaSetMode

      public void setJuliaSetMode(boolean mode)
      Sets juliaSetMode to true or false. This is used to determine if the julia set is calculated with chaos game or juliaSetMode.
      Parameters:
      mode - boolean value to set juliaSetMode to.

    • getJuliaSetMode

      public boolean getJuliaSetMode()
      Returns the value of juliaSetMode.
      Returns:
      true if the juliaSetMode set is calculated, false otherwise.

    • setCanvasSize

      public void setCanvasSize(int width, int height)
      Updates the canvas size of the Chaos Game. If auto run is true, it runs the chaos game. Runs the chaos game for a fifth of the steps to reduce choppiness when scaling.
      Parameters:
      width - the width
      height - the height

    • changeZoom

      public void changeZoom(double multiplier)
      Changes the zoom of the Chaos Game.
      Parameters:
      multiplier - the multiplier to change the zoom by.
